name: Tattered Sails
description:
Tattered Sails is about living as a pirate or creating a world of your own while engaging with other players. It is a multiplayer survival role playing game. 

We are still in early prototyping and using itch.io as a base for updates.

Dont forget to join the discord to talk with the Devs of the game. https://discord.gg/R9yBeVC
